result.title: help!
result.content:
how can i submit my code for this problem ??! http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/234/A this is my code : . . . . . . . .

include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std; int main () { int n; string s; vector l , r; cin >> n >> s; for (int x=0 ; x<n ; x++){ if (s[x]=='L') l.push_back(x+1); else r.push_back(x+1);} if (r.size()%2==0){ for (int x=0 ; x<r.size() ; x+=2) cout << r[x] << " " << r[x+1] << endl; for (int x=0 ; x<l.size() ; x+=2) cout << l[x] << " " << l[x+1] << endl; } else { cout << l[0] << " " << r[0] << endl; for (int x=1 ; x<r.size() ; x+=2) cout << r[x] << " " << r[x+1] << endl; for (int x=1 ; x<l.size() ; x+=2) cout << l[x] << " " << l[x+1] << endl; }}
